sentiment_articles.title: JPMorgan Chase tells managers to 'resist' hiring, do more with less as head count balloons
sentiment_articles.summary: JPMorgan has been in growth mode for several years. With market volatility and the rise of AI, leaders want to get more from less.

sentiment_articles.title: Wall Street is changing. See the firms young people want to work for today.

sentiment_articles.summary: Retailers like Best Buy and GameStop promise they'll have Nintendo Switch 2 in-store stock.
